member.name: M:Intell.WebGadget.MySql.MySqlNaming.IsValidColumnName(System.String)
member.summary:
Indicates whether the specified columnName is valid or not.
Warning: this function is simple not contain all rules of SQL.

member.name: T:Intell.WebGadget.MySql.MySqlSearchGenerator
member.summary: A group o

member.name: M:Intell.WebGadget.MySql.MySqlSearchGenerator.GetWhereClauseFromSearchJSON(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Gets WHERE clause for a search command from a json object.
member.param:
The JObject that contain children JToken.
Supported JToken type are string, number, bool, Array<string>, Array<int> and Array<Array<int>> for range select.
member.returns: The where clause, such as "WHERE name="Woody"", or null if don't have any conditions.

member.name: M:Intell.WebGadget.MySql.MySqlSearchGenerator.GetConditionFrom(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String)
member.summary: Gets compare clause for a JToken.
member.param: Supported JToken type are string, number, bool, Array<string>, Array<int> and Array<Array<int>> for range select.

A valid columnName will be used in command.
If columnName is not valid or unsafe, return null.
member.returns: The compare clause, such as "type=3", or null if don't have any compare or not support.

member.name: T:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriter
member.summary: Represents a rewriter that use a list of to rewrite url in .

member.name: M:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriter.Rewrite(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Rewrite path for HttpContext. If successful, return RewriteRule else return null.

member.name: M:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriter.RewriteDefaultFile(System.Web.HttpContext,Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriteRuleAction)
member.summary: If context.Request.Path refers to an existing directory on disk, rewrite to default.aspx, default.html or {folder}.html in folder.

member.name: T:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriteRule
member.summary: Represents a rewrite rule that will be used by .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriteRule.Match
member.summary:
Gets or sets the match rule.
Example: /account/[*], /account

member.name: P:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriteRule.Destination
member.summary:
Gets or sets the destination rule.
Example: /portal?app=[*]

member.name: P:Intell.WebGadget.Web.UrlRewriteRule.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets the action for this rule.
